"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"保护 EPAM 机会及避免利益冲突\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"利益冲突所发生的情况，是当你的个人或私人利益妨碍或看似妨碍了 EPAM 的利益。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 有关利益冲突的政策很简单——\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 的机会属于 EPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"你对 EPAM 的忠实义务要求你避免任何与 EPAM 利益有冲突或似有冲突的关系。你不应该把你的个人利益放在 EPAM 利益之上。你亦需要记住，情况会发生变化，之前看似可接受的情况可能变成潜在的利益冲突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果你对某种情况是否有利益冲突有疑问，可以咨询你的经理或法律部门或合规专员。如果你发现对该情况的咨询或披露与他人会令你尴尬——你最好避免该情形或征求管理层同意采取其他行动。\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"典\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"型的利益冲突情况有：\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"由于你在 EPAM 的职位而接受或给予礼品或礼遇；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"参与某些业务或投资机会；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"让家庭或个人关系影响业务决策；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"出席与EPAM竞争的活动；及\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"担任董事会成员。\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 的行为守则对以上例子做了更深入的剖析：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"保护EPAM的机会及避免利益冲突 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"当个人的私人利益干扰或看似\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"干扰EPAM的利益时，发生“利益冲突”。当员工、\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"高级职员或董事作出可能令其难以客观及有效的履行职责的行为或具有可能令其难以客观及有效的履行职责的利益时，\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"则可能出现利益冲突。当员工、\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"高级职员或董事（或其家庭成员）由于\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"该员工、高级职员或董事在EPAM的职位而获得不当的个人利益时，也可能产生利益冲突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM的机会（包括通过使用EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"的财产或信息或您在EPAM的职位发现的机会）属于EPAM。  您对EPAM的忠诚义务包括避免会与EPAM的利益或您适当履行职责的能力冲突或看似冲突的个人、财务、业务或其他关系，或避免使用EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"的财产或信息或您在EPAM的职位获取个人利益。  避免出现您似乎有将个人利益置于EPAM利益之上的动机的情况，即使该等情况只是涉嫌产生利益冲突。   当您、您的朋友或家人在EPAM机会中有个人或业务利益时，务必以符合EPAM最佳利益的方式行事。   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"有时，情况会发生变化，先前可接受的机会可能会产生潜在的利益冲突，您需要放弃该机会。  若出现会产生潜在利益冲突的EPAM机会，请向您的经理充分披露该机会及事实，未经适当的EPAM批准，不得参与该机会。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"部分常见的利益冲突领域如下所述。  即使您的情况不属于这些领域，也仍有可能产生冲突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"问问自己，相关情况是否会导致或带来让您自己或与您有个人关系的人士得益的动机。  如果您不愿披露或认为披露会导致尴尬，最好避免该情况或寻求批准。  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a. 接受礼品及招待\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"礼品和商务礼仪会带来利益冲突的表象。  尤其是当价值、成本或频率看似会影响商业决定时。    未经事先批准，不得接受礼品或招待，切勿索要礼品或招待。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"例如，如果您获提供大型高尔夫锦标赛的门票（尤其是同时提供旅行及食宿时），未经适当的批准，您不得接受。  切勿接受客户或其他业务合作伙伴提供的现金或现金等价物（如，礼品券、信用卡或贷款）。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"非现金低价礼品可以接受。  偶尔的适度餐饮及本地活动可以接受。  但是，如果这些名义礼品变得频繁或高价或会带来利益冲突的表象，这些名义礼品也应拒绝或者需要获得批准。   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"避免将任何客户或业务合作伙伴置于这样的境地：他们认为他们必须送礼、提供招待或提供个人恩惠才能与EPAM开展业务。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"商业机会及个人投资\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"通过您的工作吸引您的注意的商业机会属于EPAM，而不属于您。  这些机会应提供给EPAM，您应予以拒绝，除非您在作出充分披露后已获得EPAM的批准。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"个人投资（例如，对包括EPAM的竞争对手、客户或其他业务合作伙伴在内的上市公司进行分散投资的互惠基金）无需披露，不会被视为冲突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"禁止与EPAM竞争。  如果您对EPAM的竞争对手、客户或其他业务合作伙伴的个人投资额度足以让您被视为会以您自己的最佳利益而非EPAM的最佳利益行事，这可能会产生利益冲突。   该等对竞争对手的投资属于冲突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果该等投资对客户或其他业务伙伴作出，并且您在EPAM的职位能够影响EPAM的行动或决定，从而利用EPAM令您的个人投资受益，这也属于冲突。  切勿作出该等投资。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果您有会产生利益冲突的现有投资，或者不确定潜在投资是否会产生利益冲突，您应联系首席合规官。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"个人及业务关系\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"若与家人、朋友、业务合作伙伴或其他人士的个人或业务关系会影响或涉嫌影响您的判断，该等亲密关系也会产生潜在的利益冲突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"例如：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"为外部活动利用您在EPAM的职位或任何EPAM资产，或以会形成EPAM发起或支持相关活动的表象的方式利用您在EPAM的职位或任何EPAM资产，也会产生潜在的利益冲突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"您应与您的经理讨论潜在冲突，拒绝作出相关活动或寻求批准。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"向员工、高级职员或董事或其家人提供贷款或为该等人士的债务提供担保\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"需要特别关注，未经您经理的许可（经理须获得首席合规官的许可），\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"不得作出该等行为。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"外部雇佣及业务\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"利用属于EPAM的机会或另行与EPAM竞争或利用公司时间或资产进行的外部雇佣或业务可产生潜在的利益冲突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"潜在的利益冲突示例：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"接受EPAM的竞争对手、客户或其他业务合作伙伴的工作；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"开设与EPAM竞争或利用您知晓的EPAM的机密信息的企业；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"获取或创造您知道EPAM拥有或可能拥有权益的IP权利或获取您知道EPAM拥有或可能拥有权益的不动产权利或其他资产；或\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"开展不与EPAM竞争但利用公司时间或公司资产或另行干扰您的工作职责的业务或活动。 \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e. 理事会成员\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"董事会或咨询委员会的成员身份可能会带来潜在的利益冲突，尤其是担任竞争对手、客户、其他业务合作伙伴或行业/贸易协会的董事会或咨询委员会的成员时。  未经充分披露及CEO批准，切勿接受该等任命。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
